<title level="1" pfs="">[Mage of Many Styles](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1453)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

The mage of many styles combines magical and martial tactics. They try to hamper foes with [_black tentacles_](/Spells.aspx?ID=23) or [_confusion_](/Spells.aspx?ID=48), switching to damaging spells like [_lightning bolt_](/Spells.aspx?ID=172) once their opponents are properly lined up. When engaged in melee, they make liberal use of [_shocking grasp_](/Spells.aspx?ID=283) and [_true strike_](/Spells.aspx?ID=345) to deal powerful blows.

</column>

fist +22 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 2d6+5 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_longsword_ +23 ([Magical](/Traits.aspx?ID=103), [versatile P](/Traits.aspx?ID=200)),
**Damage** 2d8+5 slashing

**Wizard Prepared Spells** DC 32, attack +26
- **Cantrips (7th)**
[Acid Splash](/Spells.aspx?ID=3), [Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Mage Hand](/Spells.aspx?ID=177), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280), [Tanglefoot](/Spells.aspx?ID=330)
- **1st**
[Fleet Step](/Spells.aspx?ID=122), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244), [True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345)
- **2nd**
[Acid Arrow](/Spells.aspx?ID=2), [Mirror Image](/Spells.aspx?ID=197), [Touch of Idiocy](/Spells.aspx?ID=341)
- **3rd**
[Lightning Bolt](/Spells.aspx?ID=172), [True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354)
- **4th**
[Confusion](/Spells.aspx?ID=48), [Dimension Door](/Spells.aspx?ID=69), [Fly](/Spells.aspx?ID=125)
- **5th**
[Black Tentacles](/Spells.aspx?ID=23), [Shocking Grasp](/Spells.aspx?ID=283), [True Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=345)
- **6th**
[Chain Lightning](/Spells.aspx?ID=33), [Disintegrate](/Spells.aspx?ID=76), [Vampiric Exsanguination](/Spells.aspx?ID=353)
- **7th**
[Shocking Grasp](/Spells.aspx?ID=283), [True Target](/Spells.aspx?ID=346)

**Wizard School Spells** 2 Focus Points
- **7th**
[Hand of the Apprentice](/Spells.aspx?ID=530), [Physical Boost](/Spells.aspx?ID=533)

**Spell Punch** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([Flourish](/Traits.aspx?ID=73)) **Trigger** The mage of many styles begins to Cast a Spell that targets at least 1 creature; **Effect** The mage channels the spell through their fist. The mage makes a fist Strike against a target within reach. If the Strike is successful, the target is subjected to the spell. If the spell required an attack roll, the target is hit automatically upon a successful Strike. If the spell required a saving throw, the target takes a –2 status penalty to its saving throw. If the spell could target multiple creatures, it targets only the creature the mage hit with their fist Strike.

</column>
